item.title: DAL
item.description: score:-14 Chances: Robust air travel demand bodes well for the Zacks Transportation - Airline industry. Delta Air Lines (DAL) has received quite a bit of attention from Zacks.com users lately, indicating potential interest in the stock. The commercial aerospace recovery is expected to continue in 2024, presenting a positive outlook for the industry.
